It was hardly a surprise when Captain Hawking's ship followed. His apology sincere, if a little late, and the assurance that with only a skeleton crew it was there as a safety measure. On Lass' ship, and with her holding both the glass and the map, the course was smooth. Even if Teach Hawking did seem to loom over her, whenever she checked their course.

The Sun set as the ships made their way through the islands. Carefully, they skirted the various whirlpools and arcane creatures of the deep. Their fragile craft little more than floating kindling to some of the darker denizen from the watery depths.

- - - - -

Their progress stalled, as the winds rose. Too tempestuous to continue, they sheltered in an isolated bay. The shores were sandy, but the jungle was dense and sudden. The noise of raucous animals filling it.

Captain Lass receiving a tour of 'The Sturdy Sqwuak'. Lightning cracked and thunder rumbled, but the bay while lit dramatically was quiet. As a present, Teach provided the stores for the evening meal. A welcome change from the Saucy Keel's supplies.
125111.title: You all trek onboard your ship.

choices: One of the hunting parties seems to have gone missing...
The Sun rose over the crews, setting them into bustling life.
Captain Lass woke to find Hawking missing...
Captain Hawking woke to a surprise...
1251111.content:
Several row boats came and went to the shore, as the storm raged. While the tropical trees creaked in the wind, their fruits were harvested, and traps set for any curious animals. A couple went hunting for something larger deeper in the trees.

As the storm faded, campfires lit the shores, as the crews stretched their legs with the rare freedom from the tight ship confines.

There was something approximating a feast as the crews bonded. An informal mix of a picnic and an impromptu orgy. The chance to relax, tense muscles and ease unfamiliar pressures meant scattered couples disappeared into the nearby greenery. The scattering sound of giggles, and groans, were mixed with some more energetic noises.

The two captains toasted their good fortune, and the good humour of the assembled men... and women.

The food was spiced with a variety of local herbs, both known and unknown. It provided much needed variety, if a little surprise in certain mouthfuls when it was surprisingly hot.

Only a few remained on the ship, to ensure they stayed securely anchored. The majority stretched out in the sand and descended into a restful sleep.

Captain Lass on one side of the spread rug that served as a table. While Captain Hawking rested on the opposite side. Scratching his belly, something wasn't agreeing with him. With a look to the sleeping captain, he decided to return to sleep on his ship.

Captain Lass had welcomed him as an honoured guest, but it was still a ship with very limited space. A spare hammock hung above the cargo wasn't restful. As a captain, he was more used to having his one (albeit tiny) cabin, and a bed build into the walls of the ship.

At the moment, that would seem like the greatest luxury. Rowing back, he hoped the exercise would tire him out, and make sleep come easier. Securing the rowing boat in place, he stepped onto the Sturdy Sqwuak. Immediately, he felt at home. The gentle rocking familiar to his feet, he nodded to the bridge and the crewman keeping a watch there.

Raising a hand, he covered his mouth as a yawn escaped. Descending the tight spaces of the ship, he reached his cabin, and went to sleep.
1251111.title: A hunting party look to replenish both ships.

choices: She repeated her true name, to their amused derision and disbelief.
Straightening up, he proved his true identity.
Leaping overboard, she swam to the rowing boat, and made for the shore...
In the distance, on the shore. Chaos was erupting there too...
12511114.content:
It didn't remain a surprise for long, as Captain Hawking woke to her new body. The full bust, the broad hips, and as she tried to leap from the bed, she discovered how heavy and full her ass now was. Landing on the lightly rolling deck, she stumbled, crumpled and fell to the floor. Her new centre of balance far different than she was used to.

Trying to pull on his former clothes was an exercise in frustration. Those hips were just too wide for anything she'd worn before. Her face contorted, as she came to the realisation of what she'd have to wear. The limited selection she kept stowed away for her visitors. Whether a harbour whore, or a lusty wench. She'd have to wear one of those outfits.

It was humiliating, as she took in her new form. Even dressed, it was covering an obviously womanly body.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/c2/12/9a/...

She had to slide sideways out the door, and the climb to the deck was a nightmare. Feeling the width, with every rung of the ladder. The swaying of her alien bust, and the ripple and roll of that ass behind her.

Emerging into the dawn light, wasn't a relief, as she was ambushed. Wrestled to the deck.

Fighting, and struggling to explain, Captain Hawking found her new body was weak and vulnerable. The assault more intended to humiliate and embarrass her, than contain a dangerous enemy.

Her rump and tits slapped relentlessly, she had to defend them with her arms tight against her chest to prevent the tweaking, smacking, tickling attack. This damned body was too sensitive, she cursed.

Her arms were easily held tight against her heightening her vulnerability. She wriggled and struggled, but it was futile. Pinned to her side, her slender arms were useless.

Driven against the deck railing, the air was driven from her lungs. Captain Hawkings watched as his dinner spewed forth into the sea, as she fought to regain her breath.

In breathless outrage, she felt her crew playing the bongos, on her exposed ass cheeks. Roaring laughter, as she shrieked her outrage.

At least that was less degrading than the teasing caresses that followed. As her cheeks burned red and raw from the onslaught, she was held in place. The caressing hands that came next made her squirm, and grind against the railing. A fire ignited, she was mewling and whimpering with need, as she bawled, and yelped, yipping out her name in a mantra.

"Captain... Teach... Hawking..." she repeated it, again and again. The relentless attention making it high and shrill one moment, and rapid and licentious the next. It was only the misunderstanding that she was the captain's doxy that made it end. A murmur of suspicion passing through them, until no-one wanted to tease the captain's favourite.

Captain Hawking whirled around, face flushed, breathing rapid, she looked as she felt. Hot and bothered, agitated and shameless.
12511114.title: Captain Hawking woke to a surprise...

choices: "...a mountain of a rear end." (Expansion story)
12513.content:
"Ay, I do." The man said, as he reached into one of his pockets. As he did this, Lass glared at him.

"If ye knew it was me, why'd ya try to pickpocket me?" Lass asked, more annoyed then confused.

While Lass wasn't completely known at this port, some here had still heard of her, including this pickpocket Lass had business with.
After some fumbling, the pickpocket pulled out two things, a ring and a necklace.

"Here ye go. The Jewelry of Captain Nalia Black. Or two of 'em at least." The pickpocket said, before handing the jewelry to Lass. Lass eagerly took them, grinning madly.

"Took so many years, but they're finally mine." Lass said. "I just need the earring, and Captain Black's treasure will be in me hands." On that, she proceeded to put the ring and necklace on. It was then that she noticed the pickpocket now seemed worried.

"Ah, Lass. I probably should mentioned the jewelry has a... curse." The pickpocket said. "You see, Nalia was a paranoid woman, and thought her treasure would be stolen. So she cursed her jewelry. Any lady pirate who tried to find her treasure would find themselves with..."
12513.title: The Jewelry of Captain Nalia Black

info.brief_description: A Fantastical World Of Expansions and Fetishes.
info.description:
Nine-thousand years of history spread across two continents.These twin continents known as Elder and Younger, upheld as sleeping Gods to some common folks,host over thirty species of intelligent beings and thousands of other wondrous beasts. Beyond the eastern ocean of these two continents lies the home of the Gods and other mysteries. Beyond the western ocean lies the home of the dead. Above the north lies the home of lower powers(I.E higher-nymphs, demi-gods, and lesser supernatural beings.) And below in the south lies the home of abominations (I.E demons, infernal powers, heretical arch-sorcerers.)

Rules:

This is obviously a fetish-piece of work, if my normal writings are of any indication. So let's lay down the ground-rules.

One: The following fetishes are allowed in this work
Expansion/Inflation of any sort. (Lips, foot, phallus, giantess, etc)
Gender Bending
Species Transformation
BDSM
Humiliation (so tickle stuff is fine,face-sitting is a-okay as well)
Object Transformation(preferably into a inflated toy)


If its not on the list, don't add it in. So no age regression, scat, gore(unless its a fight scene), or any other stuff.
One-A: On expansion, keep to the same expansion for the MC. That is all that i'm asking for.
One-B: Popping is allowed if its for a side character. Don't be graphic, but don't make them completely disappear either.

Two: Men and Women can both expand. I am not just prevalent in one gender. If you are going to expand though add a (M) or a (W) in the expansion path.

Three: Nudity is a-okay in this interactive. Heck, go for full on nudist beach here. On the issue of sex, allude to it but don't be graphic. Men on men are okay, so is women on women. Both lesbian and gay relations are okay.

Four: There are thirty races and I have plans for fifteen of them,so I'm willing to listen if people want to add more. Email me what you want to add and we'll talk

Five:A minimum of 1100 characters in this add. Unless its a bridge text, you must add this many characters in.

Six: Go wild with character creation. A list will be up soon enough for people to see as to what species there are.

Seven: Gore is only allowed if its a fight scene. If that's the case, then add in a (G) for indication.
Seven-A:Don't go too into grimdarkness in this work. Its still a fetish piece and that stuff isn't always welcomed in the story.

Eight: If you plan on adding more locations in, email me.

Nine:Same with fleshing out microcosm in the regions.

Ten:Please have fun in this.


Edit: 6/28/20
I will be okay if you introduce a title character by proximity. Such as a character meeting said title character or if you're doing a character who is focused around a species but isn't necessarily of said species.

Also I cut down the rule sizes for easier digestion.
info.pretty_title: The Twins: A Fetish Filled Fantasy
